Name: Fix (Generic Name)
Ingredients: 60 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Match the juice and spirit and this formula works every time.
History: A Fix is a classic style of drink that consists of a spirit, lemon juice, and some kind of sweet fruit served short.
Nutrition: One serving of Fix (Generic Name) contains 189 calories
